food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I am a fruit that is yellow.
🍌 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am red and round and yummy. You can take a bite! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me!
🔴 I am a fruit that is often red.
🌱 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny likes me!
🔶 I am orange.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am white and cold and yummy. You eat me with a spoon! What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 I am a frozen treat.
⚪ I can be lots of different flavors!

food.question: I am long and brown and you eat me with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I go well with burgers.
🥔 I am made from a potato.
♨️ I am usually fried.

food.question: I am green and grow in a pod. You can eat lots of me at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a green vegetable.
🌱 I grow in a long pod.
🟢 I am small and round.

food.question: I am made of flour and baked in the oven. You can put yummy things on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 People like to eat me with cheese and toppings.
♨️ I am usually round.
🌾 I am made from wheat.

food.question: I am yellow and you can spread me on bread. Cows make the milk that makes me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I taste good on toast!
🐄 I am made from milk.
🧈 I am solid at room temperature.

food.question: I am made with eggs and sugar and baked in the oven. People sing to you when they light candles on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 You get me on your birthday!
🕯️ You can put candles on me.
🍰 I am a sweet dessert.

food.question: I am juicy and grow on vines. I can be green, red or purple. People make juice and jam out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat me in a bunch.
🍷 People use me to make wine.
🌱 I am a fruit.

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Sometimes I have flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water to grow.
🌞 The sun helps me grow tall.
🌷 Bees like to visit me.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a plant. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am the same color as a fire truck.
😋 I taste yummy in a salad.
🪴 You can pick me from a vine.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 I am Bugs Bunny's favorite food.
🌱 You pull me out of the dirt.

plant.question: I have a long stem and a colorful head. Bees love to get nectar from me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as gifts.
🌸 I smell very nice.
🌻 I need sunshine.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have lots of leaves. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a strong trunk.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

plant.question: I am green and leafy and grow low to the ground. You can run and play on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often cut with a lawnmower.
⚽ You can play soccer on me.
💧 I need to be watered.

plant.question: I am a yellow fruit that grows in bunches on a plant. Monkeys love to peel and eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am curved like a smile.
🐵 I am a popular snack for monkeys.
🌴 I grow in warm places.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can pop me to make a yummy snack! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am yellow and grow on a cob.
🍿 You can cook me and eat me at the movies.
🚜 Farmers grow a lot of me.

plant.question: I am a long, green vegetable with seeds inside. I grow on a vine and can be eaten raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and juicy.
🥗 I am good in salads and pickles.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine and water.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside and a sweet, juicy inside. I grow on a tall plant in a warm place. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I have a crown on top.
⛱️ I am found in tropical places.
🍹 I am delicious in a smoothie.
